snippet.title: Grimoire: Manastorm - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Grimoire is a multiplayer mage FPS where unique spells put a twist on classic shooter action. Scorch your enemies, vanish into thin air, or turn to stone with dozens of powerful spells at your fingertips! 

Early Access contains the following features:

6 wizard classes
Dozens of unique spells
Quick Match for easy online play
Conquest mode
4 multiplayer Conquest maps
8 Selectable Spells for class customization (4 mobility, 4 utility)” 

Now available on Steam Early Access! http://store.steampowered.com/app/335430

Music by Marcus Zuhr
http://www.marcuszuhr.com
